answers.answer: Thanks for the suggestion. Please check out our sticky note about upcoming trackers at the top of the forum. You can also go directly to this URL:http://www.medhelp.org/posts/show/603286Feel free to add your comments to the discussion at this URL.Thanks,MedHelp

Hi,We just released a new Diabetes tracker today. You can get it in the Diabetes community at:http://www.medhelp.org/forums/show/46. We're going to be adding to this over the next few weeks, so please let us know your feedback. Thanks!MedHelp

question: Im surprised a diabetic tracker is no on here, I believe it would be valuable if it in fact was placed on here.
title: Diabetic tracker
